name: Hungry For Cake
description:
Hungry For Cake is a game jam gam made in accordance with the Gam Jame, as well as the theme of "two worlds" and the restriction "the cake". 

Hope you enjoy it. Feedback highly appreciated.

Controls:

-A and D to move

-Space to jump

-E to switch between worlds

-R to restart the level

FYI: When in the cake world (the colorful one) you cannot jump (it's feature, not a bug).
